summary:
Reef App - Reef chain integrates the best aspects of the most commonly used blockchains while maintaining full smart contract compatibility.

 Reef chain - Reef chain is an EVM compatible blockchain for DeFi. It is fast, scalable, has low transaction costs and does no wasteful mining. It is built with Substrate Framework and comes with on-chain governance.

 Reef staking - Bond your REEF tokens and participate in Reef chain validation and governance.

 Reef Governance Intro - Stake Reef tokens and earn rewards for participating in Reef governance.
